item.title: Expert Video Editor/Creator for App Launch Promo - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a talented expert in video editing and creation to help bring my vision to life. For the past year, I’ve been working tirelessly on an app that’s almost ready to launch. We are aiming to go live in about three to four months.

The project includes both a mobile app and a web application. We have seven screens for the desktop version and seven screens for the mobile version, all of which are ready for you to use to create an outstanding promotional video.

What You'll Do:
- Create an amazing promotional video that highlights the app, its features, and its benefits.
- Incorporate provided content including written materials, images, HTML, videos, and screens.
- Utilize provided transcripts if we decide to include a voiceover.
- Collaborate with me and the team to ensure the video is perfect.

What We Need:
- A video that impresses and captivates the audience.
- A video that stands out from the competition and showcases the app's potential.
- A video that makes viewers believe in the app’s immense possibilities.

**What You'll Get:**
- Examples of promotional videos that we find inspiring.
- Support from our team and access to all necessary content and information.
- A chance to be part of an exciting project that could be a game-changer in its field.

If you have the skills and creativity to produce something truly amazing, we want to hear from you!

If you apply, i will send you more details.


Budget: $200
Posted On: June 29, 2024 08:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Short Stories Creator - 3D AI Animated Videos-3 - Upwork
item.description:
An experienced video creator is needed to create 15 one minute short stories videos.  3D animated stories with scenes and image prompts will be provided for you to generate images, create motions for images and then piece all elements together to create one minute animated short stories.  This is a test project, with the right fit, there will be ongoing projects.  Budget = $100 for all 15 one minute short stories.  In placing your bid, please show your best past similar work.  Only professionals with past work demos will be considered.  Thanks.

Budget: $100

Category: Video Production

item.title: Creative Video Editor Needed-2 - Upwork
item.description:
Creative and patient video editor is needed to create/edit batches of Youtube videos, mostly youtube shorts.  This is a test project, if we find you to be a great team player with us, the project can be turned into long term.   

The project budget is for a collection of Youtube short videos. Project details will be given to you if we find you to be a good fit.

When you place your bid, please let us know the following:

1) Are you familiar with using Capcut, Filmora or Canva?   What is your most preferred editing software?

2) This is not required, but we'd like to know what your other capabilities are - Are you familiar in using video generating ai tools (the ones that can use text to video or video to video or image to video?  If  you do, which ones do you know how to use?  Also, Are you familiar in using image generating ai tools?  If  you do, which ones do you know how to use?

3) What is your internet speed?  If we find you to be a good fit to help us long term, how many hours per week can you devote to help us?  Can these hours be spread out Monday through Friday?  Or, you will be working on weekends?

Please show us your past related video work.

Look forward to working with you!  We hope you are a great match for our project!

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 29, 2024 07:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing for E-Commerce Brand - Meta Ads - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are a rapidly growing musical instrument company looking to expand our creative department with a talented video editor.

Our videos will use a lot of raw clips, stock videos, and images to tell a story and influence the buyer. Some examples of what we
re looking to create: https://shorturl.at/xUx2T AND https://shorturl.at/FDHKk

Responsibilities:
- Receive RAW clips, identify usable footage from the supplied storyboard, and edit on-brand videos for our company.

- Ensure all videos adhere to the appropriate social media aspect ratios for Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.

- Produce videos that not only look great but also effectively promote and sell our instruments.

- Incorporate voice-overs, captions, and fast-paced animated titles creatively into the composition.

- Stay updated with the latest marketing techniques and visual trends to produce cutting-edge content.


Skills and Experience:
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in video editing, with a strong portfolio of direct-response video ads for Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.

- Marketing knowledge with a focus on product-focused videos.

- Ability to work independently and collaboratively on multiple projects in a fast-paced environment with tight deadlines.

- Strong conceptual skills in both video and digital environments.

- Exceptional attention to detail, with a keen awareness of project scope, delivery dates, and content objectives.

- Proficiency in Premiere Pro & After Effects.

- Ability to think creatively and push visual storytelling boundaries.

- Excellent communication and storytelling skills to convey your approach and techniques to internal team members.

- Good knowledge of video effects and unique stylized transitions.

Why You’re a Good Fit:
- When you apply, please let us know why you believe you are a good fit for this role. Highlight your relevant experience and provide examples of your work, specifically direct-response marketing videos that were used on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok. A portfolio showcasing your video editing skills is a MUST.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 07:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Advertising, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Advertising, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Commercial
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Branding, social media templates and basic website for Dog Training Service - Upwork
item.description:
I already have sample content and a sample design from Dalle.  What I can use is:
1. Logo and design assets to be used across other designs and business cards
2. A basic website; I can provide sample content and you can use Wix or whatever platform is the easiest to get something online
3. Various design assets to be used for social media postings based on services offered, education, quotes.  Enough to refresh the dog trainer's facebook page and instagram.
4. Potential edits to photos and videos sent to be re-used as the social media and website design assets.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 29, 2024 07:36 UTC
Category: Brand Identity Design
Skills:Website, Social Media Kit, Branding Template, Brand Identity Design, Social Media Design, Web Design, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Imagery

item.title: Recruit unboxing video makers - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am Lradon from Andvids.
We are a video production agency from China assisting our clients in finding  content creators to produce unboxing videos. You can not only get free products(beauty,household,outdoor products,children's and pets' toys etc.), but also commissions by doing this in your free time.

Here are some requirements for the shoot:
1. The length of the video is 1-3 minutes, of which 30% of the time is used for explanation, and 70% of the time is used to show the use scenario of the product
2. Shoot in landscape mode (16:9) ，your face need to be shown in video
3. A clean, bright shooting environment
4. Able to introduce products in fluent and clear English
5. Introduce the selling points and functions of the product, and use it in multiple scenarios.
6. Don't mention price, discount
7. In case of emergency, illness, move or vacation, please inform us in advance.
Do not show QR codes of packaging or products in the video, and do not mention personal information

About project time and delivery method
Please complete the shooting and edit within three days after receiving the product.
And name the video in this format: order number + product name + your name, and put the video Upload it to Google Drive, set the link permission to open and send it to me.
I will pay you after I review it.

Most importantly, we need the original video.
About copyright: After you agree to send the video to us, we have the right to use your likeness for promotional purposes, including but not limited to uploading the video to Amazon

Special case treatment：
  However, if you cannot complete the shooting on time after receiving the product, lose contact, do not shoot, you will be responsible for this, the solution is as follows (choose one):
1. Pay for the product.
2. Forward the product to the new address and bear the shipping cost.

Long-term cooperation：
  The first three videos are the experimental list.Of course I'll still give you a commission.
   After that, if the video effect is good and the communication between the two parties is smooth, long-term cooperation can be considered.

If you are interested in this job,feel free to contact me and please send me an introduction video or anything you have shot recently.Look forward to receiving your applications.Thank you!


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 29, 2024 07:14 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Video Production
Skills: UGC, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China
click to apply
